net.objectzoo.delegates

Interface Action0Async

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Event0AsyncDelegate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Action0AsyncSupport, Action0ToAction0Async, Event0AsyncAdapter

    public interface Action0Async
    An Action0Async is a reference to a procedure without return value that can be invoked asynchronously in another thread. With Action0Async it is possible to track the status and outcome using the ActionAsyncResult returned upon invocation or by defining a Consumer as callback for the invocation.
    Author:
    tilmann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ActionAsyncResult beginStart(Consumer<ActionAsyncResult> callback, Object asyncState)
      Asynchronously invoke this Action0Async with the given parameter value, callback and asyncState.
      static Action0Async from(Action0 action)
      Converts the given Action0 to the interface Action0Async using the default executor.
      static Action0Async from(Action0 action, Executor executor)
      Converts the given Action0 to the interface Action0Async and executes asynchronous call using the given Executor.

    • Method Detail

      • from

        static Action0Async from(Action0 action)
        Converts the given Action0 to the interface Action0Async using the default executor. Conversion is done using the adapter Action0ToAction0Async.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to be converted
        Returns:
        the converted action

      • from

        static Action0Async from(Action0 action,
                         Executor executor)
        Converts the given Action0 to the interface Action0Async and executes asynchronous call using the given Executor. Conversion is done using the adapter Action0ToAction0Async.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to be converted
        executor - the executor used for the asynchronous calls
        Returns:
        the converted action

      • beginStart

        ActionAsyncResult beginStart(Consumer<ActionAsyncResult> callback,
                             Object asyncState)
        Asynchronously invoke this Action0Async with the given parameter value, callback and asyncState.

        Associated with each call to beginInvoke is an ActionAsyncResult instance returned by the call and given to the callback that can be used to track the status and outcome of the invocation.

        Parameters:
        callback - the Consumer, if given to beginInvoke, is invoked upon completion of the Action0Async's invocation and receives the same ActionAsyncResult that is returned by the call to beginInvoke.
        asyncState - the asyncState is an arbitrary reference that, if given to beginInvoke, can be retrieved from this invocations ActionAsyncResult.getAsyncState()
        Returns:
        the ActionAsyncResult associated with this asynchronous invocation
